summary: A simple mod that blackens the daedric armour set (thus also making the red more apparrent, giving an entirely different and more sinister feel) and removes its dull grey look. Inspired by the similar 7173 mod, which is no longer downloadable.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that blackens the daedric armour set (thus also making the red more apparrent, giving an entirely different and more sinister feel) and removes its dull grey look. Inspired by the similar 7173 mod, which is no longer downloadable.

Basically, for those of us who enjoy the notion of a uncompromisingly evil daedra. Also, I guess it\'s more lore friendly than some other retextures.
author: RhoDaZZ
